mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_tb ( preset_id, user_id, posted_at, like_count ) VALUES ( #{presetId}, #{userId}, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select:
SELECT p.post_id, p.user_id, p.posted_at, p.like_count,
imt.img_url, pr.preset_name, it.item_name, u.nickname,
CASE WHEN #{userId} IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM like_tb l WHERE l.post_id = p.post_id AND l.user_id = #{userId} ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS liked,
igt.ingredient_name, igt.category_id
FROM post_tb p JOIN preset_tb pr ON pr.preset_id = p.preset_id JOIN user_tb u ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN product_item_tb pdi ON pdi.product_id = pr.product_id JOIN item_tb it ON it.item_id = pdi.item_id JOIN image_tb imt ON imt.image_id = it.image_id LEFT JOIN product_ingredient_tb pit ON pit.product_id = pr.product_id LEFT JOIN ingredient_tb igt ON igt.ingredient_id = pit.ingredient_id WHERE pr.is_deleted = 0
ORDER BY p.like_count DESC, p.posted_at DESC
